author: rvc-2011
name: aero cinnamon theme pack (3 versions)
description:
HIGHLIGHTS:

Transparency / Semi Transparency with required opacity for menu selectors

Contents: Aero Shell ; Aero Monochrome and Aero Dark

Choose the version to suit your wall paper.

Links to Wall Papers:

For Aero Dark, 3 rings => http://fav.me/d2joh6p

For Aero Monochrome and Aero Shell, you can find them on my wallpaper posts in gnome-look.org ( http://gnome-look.org/content/show.php/black+rose+view?content=143811    AND   http://widescreenwallpapers.org/wallpapers/2560x1600/a/n/antarctic-iceberg-wallpapers.jpg  respectively)

Thank You for Preview / Download.
